get.summary: Test method to check performance when a lot of courses are requested.

put.summary: Based on the given ModuleId and UserId, the status will change to the next status in the course lifetime. If no UserModule exists, a new will be created.
Based on the given ModuleId and UserId, the status will change to the previous status in the course lifetime.
Based on the given ModuleId and UserId, the Saved property of the module will be toggled on or off. If no UserModule exists a new one will be created.
The spotlight ID from the administrators organization will be set to the given id. If the id == -1, the spotlightId will be set to null.
Based on the given ModuleId and UserId, the Saved property of the module will be toggled on or off. If no UserModule exists a new one will be created.
Based on the given ModuleId and UserId, the status will toggle. If no UserModule exists, a new will be created.
The events status of all events will be checked if they are over. If so the module user status will be updated.
Based on the given ModuleId and UserId, the Saved property of the module will be toggled on or off.

get.summary: Get the lateste {amount} courses and events from the database
